0x1000102e  0xd00a    	BEQ	0x10001046
0x10001030  0x2a04    	CMP	r2, #0x04
0x10001032  0xd200    	BCS	0x10001036
0x10001036  0x0892    	LSRS	r2, r2, #0x02
0x10001038  0x6803    	LDR 	r3, [r0, #0]
0x1000103a  0x600b    	STR 	r3, [r1, #0]
0x1000103c  0x3a01    	SUBS	r2, #0x01
0x1000103e  0xd002    	BEQ	0x10001046
0x10001040  0x3004    	ADDS	r0, #0x04
